gameMode.ui:title: Game Mode
gameMode.ui:help: The game mode of the server.

pvp.ui:title: Enable Player vs Player
pvp.ui:help: Whether or not PvP is enabled on the server.

hardcore.ui:title: Hardcore
hardcore.ui:help: Whether or not the server should be in Hardcore mode.

spawnAnimals.ui:title: Enable Animals spawning
spawnAnimals.ui:help: Whether or not to spawn Animals on the server.

spawnMonsters.ui:title: Enable Monsters spawning
spawnMonsters.ui:help: Whether or not to spawn Monsters on the server.

spawnNPCs.ui:title: Enable NPCs spawning
spawnNPCs.ui:help: Whether or not to spawn NPCs on the server.

persistWorlds.ui:title: Enable Worlds persistance
persistWorlds.ui:help: Whether or not to spawn NPCs on the server.
